channel.title: Tetris - By Me
channel.description:
Hey hey Well I was bored, so I made tetris. Yes, the codings sloppy, and yes, the graphics are dodgey. Oh well, enjoy ;) http://rapidshare.de/files/21325217/Tetris.zip.html
-Iamadam

item.title: Tetris - By Me
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

[quote=“ndugu, post:29, topic:3689”][quote author=Iamadam link=topic=4494.msg44749#msg44749 date=1149748351]
Hey hey
Well I was bored, so I made tetris.
Yes, the codings sloppy, and yes, the graphics are dodgey.
Oh well, enjoy
http://rapidshare.de/files/21325217/Tetris.zip.html

-Iamadam
[/quote]
rofl u didn’t made this… i had before you … rofl
this game made daniel i dont remember last name in codes were he’s name
i have check[/quote]
What are you talking about?
Perhaps I should clarify, for the less intelligent members of this board, that this is not the original tetris - merely a clone I wrote over a year ago.

Read full topic

item.title: Tetris - By Me
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

Hmm, I think that he did something like this:

public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e) {
        int key = e.getKeyChar();
        if (key == idOfSpaceBar) {
                barIsDown = true;
        }
}

public void keyReleased(KeyEvent e) {
        barIsDown = false;
}

public method whereHeUpdatesStuff() {
        if (barIsDown) {
                Y -= 2;
        } else {
                Y--;
        }
}

Rofl, edited… instead of Y i put X, rawr…

Also, to

Iamadam:

Perhaps I should clarify, for the less intelligent members of this board, that this is not the original tetris - merely a clone I wrote over a year ago.

i just have to say lol!

Read full topic

item.title: Tetris - By Me
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

Owner Reaper:

What leet hax said, rofl. Hey I can code java, this is easy, but I don’t have the time to code all that. It would take for ever cause I get bored easily, but I, right now, well edit it, and change it up a bit. Ohh the the run.bat didn’t work, I fixed it tho… he didn’t add the " -cp . "… Is it so noobs can use it? if so, smart =P

I put the current directory in my classpath ‘environment variable’ (for lack of a better term at 6am)
And the code is quite possibly the ugliest you will ever come across. I’m ashamed that my name is on it But the game is fun I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Tetris - By Me

What leet hax said, rofl. Hey I can code java, this is easy, but I don’t have the time to code all that. It would take for ever cause I get bored easily, but I, right now, well edit it, and change it up a bit. Ohh the the run.bat didn’t work, I fixed it tho… he didn’t add the " -cp . "… Is it so noobs can use it? if so, smart =P

Reading the post made me doubt the point that you know how to program Java even more.

Read full topic

item.title: Tetris - By Me
item.dc:creator: @maru maru
item.description:
@maru wrote:

[quote=“I Am Olan14, post:18, topic:3689”][quote author=moparsc4p3 link=topic=4494.msg1641458#msg1641458 date=1185922353]
Nice game.
[/quote]

Way to bump a year-old post.[/quote]

Hehe, I think posts like this that could potentially reduce the amount of questions asked by people new to Java, as long as they use what’s given to them as a reference.

Read full topic

item.title: Tetris - By Me
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“I Am Olan14, post:20, topic:3689”][quote author=Owner Reaper link=topic=4494.msg1641851#msg1641851 date=1185929527]
ROFl, this is amazing, tetris is one of the best games (even though its really old, and boring to most) =]

I like it

Edit: Fuck, rofl, just looking at the source, its simple coding, but at the same time tireing, can’t believe you had to type all that block thing (i probably et confuse and miss it up) example. the public void StraightBlock would take me for ever, not hard bu tlazy and the cases in the public block… but still its good, glad u made it. I’ll see if I can edit it and add more, modify it, or change it up a bit… make it my style, since u never put some copyrights that mean I can’t modify it, =P
[/quote]

Thats because you don’t know how to program Java.[/quote]No, that’s because he doesn’t have the meanhax.

Read full topic
